Package com.hexaware.dao

Class VirtualArtGalleryImpl

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.VirtualArtGalleryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IVirtualArtGallery
public class VirtualArtGalleryImpl extends Object implements IVirtualArtGallery
VirtualArtGalleryImpl This class implements the IVirtualArtGallery interface, providing methods to interact with the virtual art gallery database. It handles operations related to artworks, galleries, favorites, and user management.

    • getArtworkById

      public Artwork getArtworkById(int artworkID) throws ArtworkNotFoundException
      Retrieves an artwork from the database by its ID.
      Specified by:
      getArtworkById in interface IVirtualArtGallery
      Parameters:
      artworkID - The unique identifier of the artwork to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Artwork object representing the retrieved artwork, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      ArtworkNotFoundException - If the artwork with the specified ID is not found in the database.
      SQLException - If an error occurs while interacting with the database.

    • searchArtworks

      public List<Artwork> searchArtworks(String keyword)
      Searches for artworks in the database based on a keyword. The keyword can be matched against the title or description of the artwork.
      Specified by:
      searchArtworks in interface IVirtualArtGallery
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of Artwork objects matching the search criteria. An empty list is returned if no matching artworks are found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while interacting with the database.

    • addArtworkToFavorite

      addArtworkToFavorite in interface IVirtualArtGallery
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user adding the artwork to their favorites.

      Returns:

      Throws:

    • getUserFavoriteArtworks

      public List<Artwork> getUserFavoriteArtworks(int userID) throws UserNotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of artworks favorited by a user.
      Specified by:
      getUserFavoriteArtworks in interface IVirtualArtGallery
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user whose favorite artworks are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Artwork objects representing the user's favorite artworks. An empty list is returned if the user has no favorited artworks.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user with the specified ID is not found in the database.
      SQLException - If an error occurs while interacting with the database.
